shopping.name: Pop Mart (Chongqing locations)
shopping.notes: Pop Mart operates 550+ stores in mainland China including Tier 1 cities. Chongqing likely has multiple locations in premium malls. Sells Labubu, Molly, and other blind box collectibles. Budget for browsing/small purchase.

shopping.name: Pop Mart Taikoo Li Chengdu
shopping.location: Taikoo Li shopping district, downtown Chengdu
shopping.notes: Multiple Pop Mart locations in Chengdu including Chunxi Road, SKP mall, and the beautiful Kuanzhaixiangzi (Wide Alley) branch. Perfect for Labubu and Sonny Angel hunting during evening Taikoo Li visit.

shopping.name: Maison Uma Wang
shopping.location: 299 Fuxing West Road, Fuxing Xili, Xuhui District
shopping.notes: First Maison Uma Wang store opened Jan 2025. Three-story aesthetic space showcasing full UMA WANG collection and curated brands including Astier de Villatte ceramics. Features Uma Wang's first cafe. Hours: 11:00-21:00. Metro: Line 10 Shanghai Library Station Exit 3.

shopping.name: Alter (Xintiandi Style)
shopping.notes: Ultra-chic multi-brand concept store since 2010. Carries artisanal Spanish label ANDRESGALLARDO, Parisian Y/Project, and in-house label Rolling Acid. Founder Sonja Long Xiao curates fresh international haute couture brands each season.

shopping.name: i.t blue block Xintiandi
shopping.notes: Nearly 3,000 sqm flagship opened recently. Showcases 50+ international and local fashion labels. Design mixes traditional Shanghai Shikumen architecture with modern industrial style.

shopping.name: Pop Mart Shanghai IFC / Xintiandi
shopping.location: Shanghai IFC Mall or Xintiandi area (15+ locations in Shanghai)
shopping.notes: Shanghai has 15+ Pop Mart locations including flagship stores at IFC, Shanghai Isetan, and throughout Nanjing Road/IAPM Mall. Perfect for Sonny Angel and Labubu collection hunting.

shopping.name: LOOKNOW Lab
shopping.location: Various Shanghai locations (check Wukang Road area)
shopping.notes: Carries comprehensive Sonny Angel collections including every series. Not an official Sonny Angel store but well-stocked authorized retailer.

shopping.name: DOE Xintiandi
shopping.notes: Pioneer of Shanghai streetwear scene. Pared-down shop combining cafe and casual boutique atmosphere. Great for unique Chinese streetwear finds.

shopping.name: Garden Books
shopping.location: 325 Changle Lu, near Shaanxi Nan Lu, Xuhui District
shopping.notes: Widest selection of English-language books and literature in Shanghai. Ground floor has ice-cream parlor/cafe for browsing. Independent bookstore perfect for INFJ personality - quiet, curated collection.

shopping.name: Pop Mart Beijing SKP-S Flagship
shopping.notes: Largest Pop Mart flagship in Beijing spanning 1,200+ sqm. Features futuristic retail environment with AI-powered assistants, VR experiences, and rotating art installations. Must-visit for Labubu collectors.

shopping.name: Pop Mart Sanlitun
shopping.notes: Convenient Sanlitun location near other designer boutiques. Part of Beijing's extensive Pop Mart network in premium malls.

shopping.name: Taikoo Li Sanlitun Designer Boutiques
shopping.notes: Major luxury and designer hub with standalone stores from Dior, LV, Tiffany (opened Dec 2025). Dior Maison Beijing opening soon with China's first Monsieur Dior restaurant. Also features Ader Error (Korean) and Tamburins (beauty/fragrance) first northern China stores.

shopping.name: i.t Sanlitun
shopping.notes: Multi-brand store offering designer and streetwear brands mix. Good for contemporary Chinese and international labels.

shopping.name: 798 Art District Creative Boutiques
shopping.notes: Contemporary art galleries with quirky boutiques selling handcrafted jewelry, modern home decor, and unique fashion items. Great for one-of-a-kind Chinese designer pieces. Nearby 751 Art Park also has galleries, studios, and fashion stores.

shopping.name: Beijing SKP Select
shopping.notes: One of world's top department stores (surpassed Harrods in 2020 retail sales). Carries Chinese designer brands alongside international luxury. Platform for local brands with premium shopping experience.

shopping.name: Garden Books Beijing
shopping.location: 44 Guang Hua Lu, Embassy District, Chaoyang
shopping.notes: Imported English-language books, newspapers and magazines. Popular with expats. Sister location to Shanghai Garden Books.

shopping.name: The Bookworm
shopping.location: Sanlitun area (check exact address before visiting)
shopping.notes: Bookshop and lending library with best selection of English-language books in Beijing. Has cafe serving light fare and regular lectures. Favorite expat haunt, perfect for INFJ personality.

shanghai.xintiandi: Upscale boutiques in restored shikumen buildings. Hub for Chinese designer brands and international boutiques. Host of Shanghai Fashion Week SS2026 events starting Oct 9, 2025.
shanghai.fuxing_road: Emerging designer district. Home to Maison Uma Wang (299 Fuxing West Road) and other independent designer stores.
shanghai.nanjing_road: Major shopping street near hotel with Pop Mart and mainstream retail.
shanghai.huaihai_road: Fashion boulevard with i.t blue block flagship and designer stores.

beijing.sanlitun: Premier fashion district with Taikoo Li mall. Luxury flagships (Dior, LV), Korean brands (Ader Error), and Pop Mart. Vibrant nightlife and dining scene.
beijing.798_art_district: Creative hub with contemporary galleries, independent designer boutiques, handcrafted goods. Nearby 751 Art Park for additional creative shopping.
beijing.skp_jianguomenwai: World-class luxury department store. Beijing SKP-S has largest Pop Mart flagship with futuristic retail experience.
beijing.nanluoguxiang: Historic hutong area with indie boutiques and local designer shops (if visiting).

chengdu.taikoo_li: Modern shopping complex with Pop Mart and international brands. Central downtown location.
chengdu.kuanzhaixiangzi: Wide and Narrow Alleys with beautiful Pop Mart branch. Traditional architecture meets modern retail.

pop_mart.description: China's leading blind box collectible toy company. 700+ stores globally with 550+ in mainland China.
pop_mart.popular_characters: Labubu (most popular in 2025-2026), Molly, Dimoo, Skullpanda
pop_mart.store_features: Illuminated display walls, interactive zones, limited-edition launch counters, standardized visual layout
pop_mart.price_range: €5-25 per blind box, €20-100 for limited editions
pop_mart.locations: Premium malls: MixC, IAPM, Taikoo Li, SKP across all major Chinese cities

sonny_angel.description: Japanese collectible toy brand popular in China. No dedicated physical stores in mainland China.
sonny_angel.where_to_buy: Authorized retailers like LOOKNOW Lab, online via Tmall flagship store (sonnyangel旗舰店), various boutiques and toy stores
sonny_angel.note: Check @sonnyangelchina on Instagram for latest retail locations and pop-up events

chinese_designer_brands.uma_wang: Established Chinese designer known for avant-garde aesthetics. First Maison store in Shanghai Fuxing West Road.
chinese_designer_brands.ziggy_chen: Minimalist menswear designer with standalone stores opening.
chinese_designer_brands.short_sentence: Contemporary lifestyle brand with Shanghai Anfu Road flagship.
chinese_designer_brands.hemu: Available at K11 Shopping Art Center Shanghai.
chinese_designer_brands.rui: RuirUiruI at REEL Department Store Shanghai.
chinese_designer_brands.market_trend: Chinese consumers favoring local brands increased from 15% (2011) to 85% (2020) per McKinsey data. Growing international recognition for Chinese independent designers.

budget_allocation.notes: Minimal budget allocation focused on unique Chinese items not available abroad. Main shopping concentrated in Shanghai (Day 7) and Beijing (Day 10) as requested. Costs are estimates - actual purchases should be based on specific items found and budget flexibility.

shopping_tips.payment: WeChat Pay and Alipay widely accepted. Some boutiques accept international credit cards.
shopping_tips.tax_refund: Available at premium malls and department stores for purchases over certain amounts. Keep receipts and passport.
shopping_tips.timing: Visit Pop Mart stores early for best selection of limited editions. Designer boutiques typically open 10:00-11:00 AM, close 21:00-22:00.
shopping_tips.language: Major malls have English-speaking staff. Independent boutiques may require translation app.
shopping_tips.authenticity: Stick to official stores in premium malls (SKP, Taikoo Li, IFC) to ensure authentic products.
